description:
Marui and Kite take on No. 7 Kimijima, "The Negotiator on the Court," and No. 8 Tono, "The Executioner," in the third shuffle match. It`s a strange combination, but the defensive power of Kite`s Shukuchiho compliments Marui`s trick shots, and their form appears ideal.
However, Kimijima maintains his composure in the face of the middle school pair`s success. Just then, Kite`s shot suddenly strikes Marui! Kite`s attitude shifts. He`s already made a deal with Kimijima...!
Source: crunchyroll
